---
title: "Classification & Impact Assessment"
---

## Deviation Severity Levels (Typical)

| Level | Description |
|------|------------|
| Minor | No impact on safety or data integrity |
| Major | Potential impact on safety or data |
| Critical | Significant risk to subject safety or data validity |

## CRA Role
CRAs:
- Do not determine regulatory classification alone
- Verify site assessment
- Escalate major/critical deviations
- Document rationale

## Impact Dimensions
- Subject safety
- Data integrity
- Regulatory compliance
- Study credibility
